title: Janeen Bryant, former CMS teacher and now a parent, in 1st race for board
text: Janeen Bryant has seen Charlotte-Mecklenburg Schools from the inside, as a Teach for America teacher, and as a parent â€“ her daughter is a fourth-grader at Irwin Academic Center . Now she wants a seat on the school board to help guide the
